fields.headline: And the winner is....
fields.bodyText: Sir, I salute your indefatibluuuuurrrrrggggghhh..... Posted by Dominic Fox on January 13, 2006 02:00 PM. Congratulations...a "virtual" prize on its way. Runners up Tiddles demands RESPECT! Posted by peter on January 13, 2006 03:14 PM. I salute your cleavage, your wealth, your marriageability... Posted by William Ross on January 13, 2006 12:27 PM. Don't worry you are not the first Rula I have licked up to. Posted by Michael on January 13, 2006 01:56 PM Good fun while it lasted but due to the, ahem, controversial nature of some entries we're saying no more. Read the rest of the suggested captions here.
